name: MarvinHome
0:
”Alexa, open Smith Home”
”Alexa, close all the windows”
”Alexa, change all of my lights to warm white”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Enjoy fresher air, enhanced light, and maximum views with automated windows, skylights, and doors that dynamically adapt based on personal preferences for effortless convenience and control.
